name: Project Goryo
description:
Goryō is a 2D sidescroller that aims to create an intense and continuous experience by merging runner and shooter styled sequences. The latter puts the player on a Hoverbike shooting down other bikers with an UZI, while the former sees you runnign through the floors of a Yakuza lair, slashing through them with you laser Katana while dodging their attacks. 

Goryō - a vengeful aristocratic spirit.

 Goryō's namesake came from this musical album: tps://goryokai.bandcamp.com/album/gory

Controls:

mouse - aim

left mouse click - shoote

Shooter:

WASD - Move

get off bike - Space

Runner:

rigt mouse click - attack

AD - Move

S - Roll

W - jump

Q - heal

E - interact
